 State update function, is called once per frame, animates the door.

 OpenGL drawing function, is called whenever the engine's camera can see the object, draws the door.

Public Attributes

flyAnimatedMesh* objmesh
 the door's mesh.

int animtime
 the time in which the door opens.

int ntriggers
 the number of signals the door must receive to open.

birthpad* bp
 birthpad object to be activated when the door is opened.

Detailed Description

Door class.

This class implements a door that is signaled to open by the robot generators.
